actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for international parental abduction of children, and for other purposes.
short_title: International Parental Child Abduction Act of 1989

summary.text: International Parental Child Abduction Act of 1989 - Amends the Federal criminal code to establish penalties for taking or retaining a child outside the United States with intent to defeat the lawful custody of such child by a lawful custodian in the United States. Provides for increased penalties if: (1) such lawful custody is pursuant to a court order; (2) more than one child is taken or retained; or (3) force or threat of force against a person or property is used in committing the offense.

titles.title: International Parental Child Abduction Act of 1989
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide penalties for international parental abduction of children, and for other purposes.
